title: unnaiyE pOTrum
sahitya:
unnaiyE pOTrum ennai iniyEnum uyyavE sheyyum ayyanE murugA


anupallavi

  tannigharEyillA dInadayALanE cenni malaimEl sirappODiruppOnE


caraNam    panniru kaNgaLil onrin kadiroLi enmEl paTTadum innalin tollai
onrEnum tangi ninriDAmal ODum enru tiNNamAi eNNit-tudi paNNi
